# Interface LLMMatcherConfigInterface

Interface for configuring LLM-based intent matching.

interface LLMMatcherConfigInterface {  
embeddingSimilarityThreshold?: number;  
generationConfig?: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
maxEmbeddingMatchesForLlm?: number;  
promptTemplate?: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

embeddingSimilarityThreshold? generationConfig? maxEmbeddingMatchesForLlm? promptTemplate?

## Properties

### `Optional`embeddingSimilarityThreshold

embeddingSimilarityThreshold?: number

Threshold for embedding similarity when pre-filtering intents (0-1)

### `Optional`generationConfig

generationConfig?: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration for text generation used in LLM matching

### `Optional`maxEmbeddingMatchesForLlm

maxEmbeddingMatchesForLlm?: number

Maximum number of embedding matches to pass to the LLM for final ranking

### `Optional`promptTemplate

promptTemplate?: string

Template used for intent recognition prompts

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
